system.domainDescription:
At the start of a mission, the Ogre chooses an exorcist and creates a creature formed from the guilt and shame of that exorcist. The Admin secretly asks the targeted exorcist the following questions: 

• Which ally are you embarrassed to be around? • What's the worst thing you ever did? 

• What do you hate the most about yourself? The creature takes a form that plays off these answers. It is a trace with the following execution talisman.
